meanings.definition: A hybrid grain produced by crossing wheat and rye.
meanings.sent1: Farmers planted triticales in the field.
meanings.sent2: The bakery used triticales to make delicious bread.
meanings.sent3: The triticales danced in the wind, showing off their unique blend.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were a mix of triticales, combining different elements seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The triticales stood tall, a symbol of innovation in agriculture.

meanings.sent1: The triticales grew quickly in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: We admired the beauty of the triticales swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the triticales.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of triticales, nurturing new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The triticales whispered secrets to the neighboring plants.
